task_intent.label: Examples
items: Create a 2026 New Year resolution tracker with weekly milestones
Write a February newsletter announcing our AI product launch
Plan a budget-friendly Valentine's Day date with creative ideas

context.label: Include things like
items: Your current situation or role
Relevant past experience or knowledge
Specific requirements or preferences

constraints.label: Examples
items: Always use first principles thinking with objective & rational scientific thinking.
Keep it under 200 words
Don't use jargon or technical terms
Must include a call-to-action
When referring to scientific concepts or answering them, use ONLY top & credible scientific sources & clearly mention & link them.
And when specific questions are asked about resources, always refer to the original document for references and quote them.
And always verify your output is in line with the question asked. If not, this is a critial issue and you need to rethink from objective & rational scientific thinking.

ai_role.label: Popular roles
items: IT Professional
Senior Principal Engineer
Product Manager
Entrepreneur
Content Creator

disallowed_content.label: Examples
items: Never cite news articles, opinions, op-eds, or Wikipedia for scientific concepts
Do not fabricate or derive text when referencing specific resources
Do not use outdated statistics or unverified claims
Do not sound pushy or salesy
Do not use jargon or technical terms
